Class Appendix

extends java.lang.Object

    付録パッケージクラス。

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Appendix(java.io.File dir)
      Initialize new appendix object by looking into File dir of the appendix package.
      Appendix(java.lang.String path)
      Initialize new appendix object indicated by String path.

      • getSubAppendix

        public SubAppendix getSubAppendix(int index)

        Returns sub-book object in the appendix package indicated by index.

        Parameters:
        index - an index in the sub-books list.
        Returns:
        SubAppendix object that is sub-book of appendix package. null when index is out of bound.
